ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from skipping certain Statuses
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( CASE( Status__c ,
"New",1,
"Waiting for customer",2,
"Awaiting Vendor",3,
4)
>
CASE( PRIORVALUE(Status__c) ,
"New",1,
"Waiting for customer",2,
"Awaiting Vendor",3,
4) +1,
ISPICKVAL(Case__r.Type, 'Fiber') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please move the Activation Line to the next Status step.
